title: mmmm, thats a tilter.....
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JYaZpEUexaE&feature=youtu.be

so first time maokai learning as i go, trying to learn some disgusting meta tanks to be one of those people, get three man ganked and die giving first blood, start getting tunnel vision that im going to feed and lose the game..... then a while later this happened and i literally laughed my ass of for a good couple of minutes.... never take obj without {{summoner:11}} up and dont smite in the middle of killing it like this fool did. It is bronze so shit like this is gonna happen.

we won and i got a chest.... winner chicken dinner.

replies.body: Are you aware that you can double click on your champion model and the camera stays on it?
yeah but i'd already recorded it like that and im very lazy.
wow with ur mechanics u shud be plat.. so pro. How are you bronze? ur temas holding u back

because playing maokai top takes mechanics http://i0.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/023/824/lul.jpg

kinda wanted to show this for the shear hilarity factor that i got herald with 1 auto then proceeded to get first tower blood with it.... all luck, no skill.. also thick skinned so you make me laugh.
